name: Survival Zombies The Inverted Evolution
description:
WHAT IS SURVIVAL ZOMBIES
Survival Zombies is a bloody chaotic survival first person shooter that pits heavily armed players against humanity's greatest fear - hordes of undead

THE SETTING
Survival Zombies is something you have never seen before

FEATURES
1K+ Achievements

Day and night options, rain, night vision, different enemy types, bosses, grenades and loads of guns to put them down.

Use your wits, speed and anything you can get your hands on in epic zombie brawl!.
